entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deschambault 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.7°C
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow or rain early this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 120 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
